remarks: Property of a linear functional.  ( ~ lnfnli analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2014.)
statement:
lflset.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lflset.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lflset.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lflset.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lflset.k $e |- K = ( Base ` D ) $.
lflset.p $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` D ) $.
lflset.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` D ) $.
lflset.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lfli $p |- ( ( W e. Z /\ G e. F /\ ( R e. K /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( G ` ( ( R .x. X ) .+ Y ) ) = ( ( R .X. ( G ` X ) ) .+^ ( G ` Y ) ) ) $.
